screens/TransactionsScreen.Start transacting with your wallet. All: 您能开始从钱包做交易. 所有 UTXO 交易都会在这里显示.目前还不提供其他交易类型.

screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.DFI exists in two forms – UTXO and token: DFI 有两种形式 - UTXO 和代币, 两者可依据使用做互换. 这个程序可以进行互换.
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.UTXO DFI is the main form DFI and is use: UTXO DFI 是 DFI 的主要形式，用来做接收、发送、费用和其他加密货币功能. DFI 代币适用于 DeFi 功能如兑换或流动性挖矿.
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.Your DFI balance includes both UTXO and: 您的 DFI 总资金含 UTXO 和代币形式

screens/OnboardingCarousel.Nobody owns your keys and wallet except: 除了您之外没有任何人能控制您的私钥.
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Transact, liquidity mine, swap and many: 双方交易、流动性挖矿、兑换和其他去中心化钱包功能.
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Earn high yields: 本项目从未做任何融资，
screens/OnboardingCarousel.of up to 90% with DEX: 以先来先得的社区参与方式收获，目前高回报率高达 90%
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Supply liquidity to BTC, ETH, and many o: 为流动性池提供 BTC、ETH和其他流动池配对，并获得区块奖励. 您可以随时取出奖励！

screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.If you leave this screen, you will be pr: 如果您离开此页，您会产生新的24字恢复字组. 确认要继续？
screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.Take note of the words in their correct: 请注意每个字的正确顺序排列

screens/Guidelines.Before you create a wallet, you will see: 在创建钱包钱，萤幕会显示您的 24个字的恢复字组，请确保保管好这些字组.
screens/Guidelines.Learn more about recovery words: 了解更多关于「恢复字组」
screens/Guidelines.I understand it is my responsibility to: 我了解保管好我的恢复字组是我的个人责任，也了解当丢失了之后是无法还原钱包，造成可能性的资金损失.
screens/Guidelines.Take note of their correct spelling and: 注意每个字的顺序排列和拼字
建议使用线下，不在光线下或潮湿的地方.
screens/Guidelines.Don’t share to anyone. Keep the recovery: 不要将这恢复字组让别人知道

screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 您独特的24个恢复字代表可读的钱包私钥，是由BIP-39标准中的2048个字列表生成.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.You will need your recovery words to res: 您需要使用恢复字组在新的手机上恢复钱包，可以把这个关联想像成您的钱包和资金的钥匙.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.If you lose your recovery words, you wil: 如果您丢失字组，您就不能恢复钱包，也会丢失钱包所有资料和资金.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.It is important that you write down your: 请注意 ：记下恢复字组和字组排列是非常重要的.请保管好，避免他人能看到，放在一个防潮湿、防水火、或任何对字组有害的环境

screens/PinConfirmation.It may take a few seconds to securely en: 需要一些时间进行钱包加密
screens/PinConfirmation.Your wallet was unlinked for your safety: 您输入了多次错误的密码，为了安全，目前钱包已解开链接. 请用恢复自组以还原和重设钱包.
screens/PinConfirmation.Last attempt or your wallet will be unli: 最后一次可输入密码，为了安全，如果不通过，您的钱包会解开链接
screens/PinConfirmation.Incorrect passcode. {{attemptsRemaining}: 密码错误. 您还剩 {{attemptsRemaining}} 次可输入密码

screens/PinCreation.Well done! Your wallet is created. Keep: 恭喜您创建新钱包！接着请创建密码以维持安全保护.
screens/PinCreation.Well done! Your wallet is restored. Keep: 恭喜您恢复钱包！接着请创建密码以维持安全保护.

screens/FeatureFlagScreen.Feature is still in Beta. Use at your ow: 功能仍处于测试阶段。使用时风险请自己负责。

您正要切换至 {{network}}，确认并继续？

components/RecoveryWordFaq.What happens if I lose my recovery words: 如果我遗失了恢复字组会怎样？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Once you lose your recovery words, you w: 如果遗失恢复字组, 使用者将无法恢复钱包及所储存的资产。建议使用者必须好好保管及存放。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can I use the 24-words from xxx that I c: 如果我的24单词是透过 xxx 产生，可以使用吗 ？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.You can only reuse the 24-words only if:
如何你的24单词是透过 Jellyfish 生态产生的， 你可以重新使用24单词。

兼容客户端包括 DeFiChain 钱包 (安卓或苹果iOS系统)，及 DFX.SWISS (安卓或苹果iOS系统)。

但是，我们非常不鼓励你重复使用它，你的24单词的安全性仅与生成它的源始计算机/设备/应用程式保证一样安全。否则的话，24单词的安全性是不获确认的。最重要的是每台计算机/设备/应用程式配置独立一套的24单词。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can someone help me if I lose my recover: 如果我遗失了恢复字组可以求助于别人吗？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.No. You have sole access to your recover: 不建议。个人的24个单词是不应该透露给任可人。除了自己，没有人有责任和义务给你保管。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Why is it recommended to keep my recover: 为何建议用离线方式或纸张来纪录保存 24个单词？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Storing it in digital networks could mak: 储存24单词在数字网络会有较高的机会给骇客入侵及盗取。最理想的是用纸张记录和保存。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 你的连续显示24个英文单词是指储存在钱包的private key，它由2048个单字所产生的，支持BIP-39 标准的钱包。就算整个硬体钱包被盗或入侵，仍然可以确保安全的。

components/PasscodeFaq.Your six-digit numeric code passcode, se: Your six-digit numeric code passcode, set by you, would be use to authorize all transactions. Keep your passcode private and secure. You are responsible for your own security.
components/PasscodeFaq.What happens if I forgot my passcode? Ca: What happens if I forgot my passcode?
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is your responsibility, he: Your passcode is your responsibility, hence no one, aside from you, knows it. It is important that you keep your passcode safe and change it from time to time.
components/PasscodeFaq.Yes, you can change your passcode from y: Yes, you can change your passcode from your settings in-app. We recommend changing of passcode regularly for maximum security.
components/PasscodeFaq.Is passcode the same as phone PIN code?: Is passcode the same as phone PIN code?
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChai: Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChain wallet.

screens/CreateVaultScreen.Keep note of your selected collateral ra: 请注意您为金库选择的抵押品比率，以维持持续贷款.
